name: Regional Coal Consumption - BP Statistics (2016)
title: Regional Coal Consumption - BP Statistics (2016)
description: Data accounts for commercially-traded fuels and modern renewable technologies used for electricity production. As such, it does not include traditional biofuel consumption.

sources.name: Regional Coal Consumption - BP Statistics (2016)
sources.dataPublishedBy: BP Statistical Review of World Energy 2016
sources.additionalInfo: Data accounts for commercially-traded fuels and modern renewable technologies used for electricity production. As such, it does not include traditional biofuel consumption.
